entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
